<!-- Script Menu Hover Panels -->
<script class="header-desktop">
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    const containerMenu = document.querySelector(".container-menu-dropdown-elements");
    const containerPanels = document.querySelector(".container-panels");
    const panels = document.querySelectorAll('.panel');

    containerMenu.addEventListener("mouseover", function () {
      containerPanels.classList.add("active");
    });
    containerMenu.addEventListener("mouseout", function () {
      containerPanels.classList.remove("active");
    });

    containerPanels.addEventListener("mouseover", function () {
      containerPanels.classList.add("active");
    });

    containerPanels.addEventListener("mouseout", function () {
      containerPanels.classList.remove("active");
    });

    const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.element');
    elements.forEach(element => {
      element.addEventListener("mouseover", function () {
        const panelIndex = this.getAttribute('data-panel');
        panels.forEach((panel, index) => {
          panel.style.zIndex = index + 1 == panelIndex ? "101" : "99";
        });
      });
    });

    panels.forEach(panel => {
      panel.addEventListener("mouseover", function () {
        containerPanels.classList.add("active");
      });
    });
  });


  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    const panels = document.querySelectorAll('.panel');
    const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.element');
    const containerPanels = document.querySelector('.container-panels');
    let isFirstTabHovered = false;
    let isFirstElementHovered = false;
    let timeout;

    containerPanels.addEventListener("mouseleave", function (event) {
      if (!event.relatedTarget || !containerPanels.contains(event.relatedTarget)) {
        clearTimeout(timeout);
        containerPanels.classList.remove('active');
        containerPanels.dataset.hovered = 'false'; // Réinitialiser la propriété de dataset
        isFirstTabHovered = false;
        isFirstElementHovered = false;
        removePanelActiveClass(); // Retirer panel-active de tous les container-panel
      }
    });

    document.addEventListener("mousemove", function (event) {
      // Réinitialiser les états si la souris quitte la fenêtre
      if (event.target === document.documentElement) {
        isFirstTabHovered = false;
        isFirstElementHovered = false;
      }
    });

    function removePanelActiveClass() {
      const activePanels = document.querySelectorAll('.container-panel.panel-active');
      activePanels.forEach(panel => {
        panel.classList.remove('panel-active');
      });
    }

    function handleMouseover(target, panelIndex, delay) {
      if (!containerPanels.classList.contains('active') || (!isFirstTabHovered && !isFirstElementHovered)) {
        clearTimeout(timeout);
        containerPanels.classList.add('active');
        containerPanels.dataset.hovered = 'true'; // Ajouter une propriété de dataset pour indiquer le survol

        timeout = setTimeout(() => {
          // Vérifier si la souris est toujours sur .container-panels
          if (containerPanels.dataset.hovered === 'true') {
            const containerPanel = document.querySelector(`.container-panel${panelIndex}`);
            containerPanel.classList.add('panel-active');
            isFirstTabHovered = true;
          }
        }, 400); // Ajuster le delai de l'arrivée de l'interieur du panneau
      }
    }
    function handleMouseout(panelIndex, relatedTarget) {
      if (containerPanels.classList.contains('active') && isFirstTabHovered) {
        clearTimeout(timeout);

        // Si la souris quitte .container-panels et entre dans .element, alors délai = 0
        if (relatedTarget && relatedTarget.classList.contains('element')) {
          timeout = setTimeout(() => {
            const containerPanel = document.querySelector(`.container-panel${panelIndex}`);
            containerPanel.classList.remove('panel-active');
            isFirstElementHovered = false;
          }, 0);
        } else {
          isFirstElementHovered = true;
        }
      }
    }


    elements.forEach(element => {
      element.addEventListener("mouseover", function () {
        const panelIndex = this.getAttribute('data-panel');
        handleMouseover(this, panelIndex, isFirstTabHovered ? 0 : 300);
      });

      element.addEventListener("mouseout", function (event) {
        const panelIndex = this.getAttribute('data-panel');
        handleMouseout(panelIndex, event.relatedTarget);
      });
    });

    panels.forEach(panel => {
      panel.addEventListener("mouseover", function () {
        const panelIndex = this.getAttribute('data-panel');
        if (!isChildOf(event.relatedTarget, containerPanels)) {
          handleMouseover(this, panelIndex, isFirstTabHovered ? 0 : 300);
        }
      });

      panel.addEventListener("mouseout", function (event) {
        const panelIndex = this.getAttribute('data-panel');
        handleMouseout(panelIndex, event.relatedTarget);
      });
    });

    function isChildOf(child, parent) {
      while (child !== null) {
        if (child === parent) {
          return true;
        }
        child = child.parentNode;
      }
      return false;
    }
  });



</script>

<!-- Script Inner Menu Items -->
<script class="header-desktop">


  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    const categories = document.querySelectorAll('.container-bycategories-items-header span');
    const subcategories = document.querySelectorAll('.subcategory-items');
    const containerPanels = document.querySelector('.container-panels');

    let activeCategory = null;

    categories.forEach(category => {
      category.addEventListener('click', function () {
        const categoryNumber = this.classList[1].replace('category', '');
        toggleCategory(categoryNumber, this);
      });
    });

    function toggleCategory(categoryNumber, clickedCategory) {
      subcategories.forEach(subcategory => {
        subcategory.style.transition = 'opacity 600ms';
      });

      subcategories.forEach(subcategory => {
        subcategory.style.opacity = '0';
        subcategory.style.zIndex = '-1';
        subcategory.classList.remove('hovered');
      });

      const correspondingSubcategory = document.querySelector(`.category${categoryNumber}-subcategory`);
      correspondingSubcategory.style.opacity = '1';
      correspondingSubcategory.style.zIndex = '10';
      correspondingSubcategory.classList.add('hovered');

      if (activeCategory && activeCategory !== clickedCategory) {
        activeCategory.classList.remove('grey-active');
      }

      clickedCategory.classList.add('grey-active');
      activeCategory = clickedCategory;
    }

    function resetClickLogic() {
      subcategories.forEach(subcategory => {
        subcategory.style.transition = '';
        subcategory.style.opacity = '0';
        subcategory.style.zIndex = '-1';
        subcategory.classList.remove('hovered');
      });

      categories.forEach(category => {
        category.classList.remove('grey-active');
      });

      activeCategory = null;
    }

    containerPanels.addEventListener('transitionend', function (event) {
      if (event.propertyName === 'opacity' && !containerPanels.classList.contains('active')) {
        resetClickLogic();
      }
    });

    // Ajoutez le code pour simuler le clic sur .category1 uniquement si aucun span n'est actuellement cliqué
    containerPanels.addEventListener('transitionstart', function (event) {
      if (event.propertyName === 'opacity' && containerPanels.classList.contains('active') && !activeCategory) {
        // Simule un clic sur .category1
        const category1 = document.querySelector('.category1');
        category1.click();
      }
    });
  });


  window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    const categoryOriginTop = document.querySelector('.categoryOriginTop');
    const subcategoryNewTop = document.querySelector('.subcategoryNewTop');
    const categoryOriginTop2 = document.querySelector('.categoryOriginTop2');
    const subcategoryNewTop2 = document.querySelector('.subcategoryNewTop2');
    const categoryOriginTop3 = document.querySelector('.categoryOriginTop3');
    const subcategoryNewTop3 = document.querySelector('.subcategoryNewTop3');
    const categoryOriginTop4 = document.querySelector('.categoryOriginTop4');
    const subcategoryNewTop4 = document.querySelector('.subcategoryNewTop4');
    const categoryOriginTop5 = document.querySelector('.categoryOriginTop5');
    const subcategoryNewTop5 = document.querySelector('.subcategoryNewTop5');

    // Calcule la distance entre le haut de la fenêtre et categoryOriginTop
    const distanceFromTop = categoryOriginTop.offsetTop;
    const distanceFromTop2 = categoryOriginTop2.offsetTop;
    const distanceFromTop3 = categoryOriginTop2.offsetTop;
    const distanceFromTop4 = categoryOriginTop3.offsetTop;
    // const distanceFromTop5 = categoryOriginTop4.offsetTop;

    // Applique la distance comme top pour subcategoryNewTop
    subcategoryNewTop.style.top = distanceFromTop + 'px';
    subcategoryNewTop2.style.top = distanceFromTop2 + 'px';
    subcategoryNewTop3.style.top = distanceFromTop3 + 'px';
    // subcategoryNewTop4.style.top = distanceFromTop4 + 'px';
    // subcategoryNewTop5.style.top = distanceFromTop5 + 'px';
  });





</script>

<script>
  // Function to be executed when mutations are observed
  const callback = function (mutationsList, observer) {
    // Use traditional 'for loops' for IE 11
    for (let mutation of mutationsList) {
      if (mutation.type === 'attributes' && mutation.attributeName === 'class') {
        let containerPanels = document.querySelector('.container-panels');
        let lineHeaderGrey = document.querySelector('.line-header-grey');

        if (containerPanels.classList.contains('active')) {
          // Add the class if .container-panels has the specific class
          lineHeaderGrey.classList.add('opacity-line-header-hover');
        } else {
          // Remove the class if it doesn't
          lineHeaderGrey.classList.remove('opacity-line-header-hover');
        }
      }
    }
  };

  // Select the node that will be observed for mutations
  const targetNode = document.querySelector('.container-panels');

  // Options for the observer (which mutations to observe)
  const config = { attributes: true };

  // Create an instance of MutationObserver with the callback
  const observer = new MutationObserver(callback);

  // Start observing the target node for configured mutations
  observer.observe(targetNode, config);

  // Later, you can stop observing
  // observer.disconnect();
</script><header class="header-mobile">
    <a class="logo-header-mobile logo-header-mobile-white" href="[DIRECTORY_BASE_PATH]/">
        <img src="[DIRECTORY_BASE_PATH]/public/media/svg-assets/logo-donzelli-black.svg" alt="">
    </a>
    <a class="logo-header-mobile logo-header-mobile-black" href="[DIRECTORY_BASE_PATH]/">
        <img src="[DIRECTORY_BASE_PATH]/public/media/svg-assets/logo-donzelli-white.svg" alt="">
    </a>
    <a class="logo-header-mobile logo-header-mobile-mix" href="[DIRECTORY_BASE_PATH]/">
        <img src="[DIRECTORY_BASE_PATH]/public/media/svg-assets/logo-donzelli-white.svg" alt="">
    </a>
    <div class="close-sidebar-mobile">
        <p class="nav-item-typo">Close Menu</p>
        <img src="[DIRECTORY_BASE_PATH]/public/media/svg-assets/cross-white.svg" alt="">
    </div>

    <div class="burger-mobile">
        <p class="nav-item-typo">Menu</p>
        <div class="lines-burger-mobile">
            <div class="line"></div>
            <div class="line"></div>
        </div>
    </div>


    <div class="line-color-bottom-header-mobile"></div>

</header>


<script>

    window.addEventListener("load", function () {
        var burgerMobile = document.querySelector(".burger-mobile");
        var closeCrossMobile = document.querySelector(".close-sidebar-mobile");
        var sidebarMobile = document.querySelector(".sidebar-mobile");
        var bodyHey = document.querySelector("body");
        var htmlHey = document.querySelector("html");
        var headerMob = document.querySelector(".header-mobile");

        burgerMobile.onclick = function () {
            burgerMobile.classList.add("diseappearBurger");
            closeCrossMobile.classList.add("appearClose");
            sidebarMobile.classList.add("to-left-mobile-menu");
            bodyHey.classList.add("fix-scroll");
            htmlHey.classList.add("fix-scroll");
            headerMob.classList.add("scroll-mobile-header-home");
        };

        closeCrossMobile.onclick = function () {
            closeCrossMobile.classList.remove("appearClose");
            sidebarMobile.classList.remove("to-left-mobile-menu");
            burgerMobile.classList.remove("diseappearBurger");
            htmlHey.classList.remove("fix-scroll");
            bodyHey.classList.remove("fix-scroll");

            // Calcul du pourcentage de défilement
            var scrollPercentage = (window.scrollY / document.documentElement.clientHeight) * 100;

            // Retirer la classe seulement si le scroll est inférieur à 10%
            if (scrollPercentage < 10) {
                headerMob.classList.remove("scroll-mobile-header-home");
            }
        };
    });

</script><div class="sidebar-desk">

                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="all-brands-mobile">
                <a class="nav-item-typo all-brands-link-mobile" href="">All Brands <img
                        src=" [DIRECTORY_BASE_PATH]/public/media/svg-assets/arrow-white.svg" alt=""></a>
                <div class="container-double-list-all-brands">
                    <div class="column-allbrands-mobile nav-item-typo">

<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
        var buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.buttonpanelmobile1, .buttonpanelmobile2, .buttonpanelmobile3');
        var mainContainer = document.querySelector('.main-container-sidebar-mobile');

        buttons.forEach(function (button) {
            button.addEventListener('click', function () {
                // Ajoutez une classe avec opacité 0 à .main-container-sidebar-mobile
                mainContainer.classList.add('hide-container');

                var panelNumber = button.classList[1].replace('buttonpanelmobile', '');
                var panel = document.querySelector('.panelmobile' + panelNumber);

                // Ajoutez la classe active-panel au panneau correspondant
                panel.classList.add('active-panel');

                // Ajoutez la classe active-transition après un délai pour la transition d'opacité
                setTimeout(function () {
                    panel.classList.add('active-transition');
                }, 50); // ajustez la durée du délai en fonction de la durée de votre transition
            });
        });

        var backButton = document.querySelectorAll('.back');

        backButton.forEach(function (backButton) {
            backButton.addEventListener('click', function () {
                var activePanel = document.querySelector('.panelmobilesub.active-panel');

                // Ajoutez la classe pour gérer le z-index après un délai
                activePanel.classList.add('z-index-transition');

                // Supprimez la classe active-transition pour désactiver la transition d'opacité
                activePanel.classList.remove('active-transition');

                // Ajoutez un délai avant de supprimer la classe active-panel pour laisser la transition se terminer
                setTimeout(function () {
                    activePanel.classList.remove('active-panel', 'z-index-transition');
                    // Retirez la classe avec opacité 0 à .main-container-sidebar-mobile après la transition
                    mainContainer.classList.remove('hide-container');
                }, 0); // ajustez la durée du délai en fonction de la durée de votre transition
            });
        });

        var closeSidebarButton = document.querySelector('.close-sidebar-mobile');

        closeSidebarButton.addEventListener('click', function () {
            var sidebar = document.querySelector('.sidebar-mobile');

            // Retirez la classe "to-left-mobile-menu" du menu latéral
            sidebar.classList.remove('to-left-mobile-menu');

            // Retirez la classe "active-panel" et "active-transition" de tous les panneaux
            var activePanels = document.querySelectorAll('.panelmobilesub.active-panel');

            activePanels.forEach(function (panel) {
                panel.classList.remove('active-panel', 'active-transition', 'z-index-transition');
            });

            // Retirez la classe avec opacité 0 à .main-container-sidebar-mobile après la transition
            setTimeout(function () {
                mainContainer.classList.remove('hide-container');
            }, 0); // ajustez la durée du délai en fonction de la durée de votre transition
        });

        var sidebar = document.querySelector('.sidebar-mobile');

        sidebar.addEventListener('transitionend', function (event) {
            if (event.propertyName === 'left' && !sidebar.classList.contains('to-left-mobile-menu')) {
                // Retirez la classe "active-panel" et "active-transition" de tous les panneaux
                var activePanels = document.querySelectorAll('.panelmobilesub.active-panel');

                activePanels.forEach(function (panel) {
                    panel.classList.remove('active-panel', 'active-transition', 'z-index-transition');
                });

                // Retirez la classe avec opacité 0 à .main-container-sidebar-mobile après la transition
                setTimeout(function () {
                    mainContainer.classList.remove('hide-container');
                }, 300); // ajustez la durée du délai en fonction de la durée de votre transition
            }
        });

    });

    // document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    //     // ... (votre code existant)

    //     var titleItemDrops = document.querySelectorAll('.title-item-drop');

    //     titleItemDrops.forEach(function (titleItemDrop) {
    //         titleItemDrop.addEventListener('click', function () {
    //             var dropdownContent = titleItemDrop.nextElementSibling;
    //             var currentDropdownPlus = titleItemDrop.querySelector('.dropdown-plus');
    //             var currentDropdownMoins = titleItemDrop.querySelector('.dropdown-moins');

    //             // Fermer les autres dropdowns
    //             var otherTitleItemDrops = document.querySelectorAll('.title-item-drop.active-dropdown');
    //             otherTitleItemDrops.forEach(function (otherTitleItemDrop) {
    //                 var otherDropdownContent = otherTitleItemDrop.nextElementSibling;
    //                 var otherDropdownPlus = otherTitleItemDrop.querySelector('.dropdown-plus');
    //                 var otherDropdownMoins = otherTitleItemDrop.querySelector('.dropdown-moins');

    //                 otherDropdownContent.classList.remove('active-dropdown');
    //                 otherDropdownPlus.classList.remove('hide-opacity');
    //                 otherDropdownMoins.classList.remove('show-opacity');
    //             });

    //             // Toggle les classes pour le .container-dropdown-content associé
    //             dropdownContent.classList.toggle('active-dropdown');

    //             // Toggle les classes pour le .dropdown-plus et .dropdown-moins actuels
    //             currentDropdownPlus.classList.toggle('hide-opacity');
    //             currentDropdownMoins.classList.toggle('show-opacity');
    //         });
    //     });

    //     // ... (le reste de votre code)
    // });


    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
        var titleItemDrops = document.querySelectorAll('.title-item-drop');

        function removeDropdownClasses() {
            // Supprimer les classes des dropdowns
            var allDropdownContents = document.querySelectorAll('.container-dropdown-content');
            allDropdownContents.forEach(function (dropdownContent) {
                dropdownContent.classList.remove('active-dropdown');
            });

            var allDropdownPluses = document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown-plus');
            var allDropdownMoins = document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown-moins');
            allDropdownPluses.forEach(function (dropdownPlus) {
                dropdownPlus.classList.remove('hide-opacity');
            });
            allDropdownMoins.forEach(function (dropdownMoins) {
                dropdownMoins.classList.remove('show-opacity');
            });

            var allTitleItemDrops = document.querySelectorAll('.title-item-drop');
            allTitleItemDrops.forEach(function (titleItemDrop) {
                titleItemDrop.classList.remove('active-dropdown');
            });
        }

        titleItemDrops.forEach(function (titleItemDrop) {
            titleItemDrop.addEventListener('click', function () {
                var dropdownContent = titleItemDrop.nextElementSibling;
                var currentDropdownPlus = titleItemDrop.querySelector('.dropdown-plus');
                var currentDropdownMoins = titleItemDrop.querySelector('.dropdown-moins');

                // Fermer les autres dropdowns et retirer les classes ajoutées
                var otherTitleItemDrops = document.querySelectorAll('.title-item-drop');
                otherTitleItemDrops.forEach(function (otherTitleItemDrop) {
                    if (otherTitleItemDrop !== titleItemDrop) {
                        var otherDropdownContent = otherTitleItemDrop.nextElementSibling;
                        var otherDropdownPlus = otherTitleItemDrop.querySelector('.dropdown-plus');
                        var otherDropdownMoins = otherTitleItemDrop.querySelector('.dropdown-moins');

                        if (otherDropdownContent) {
                            otherDropdownContent.classList.remove('active-dropdown');
                        }
                        if (otherDropdownPlus) {
                            otherDropdownPlus.classList.remove('hide-opacity');
                        }
                        if (otherDropdownMoins) {
                            otherDropdownMoins.classList.remove('show-opacity');
                        }

                        otherTitleItemDrop.classList.remove('active-dropdown');
                    }
                });

                // Ajouter/retirer les classes pour le .container-dropdown-content associé
                if (dropdownContent) {
                    dropdownContent.classList.toggle('active-dropdown');
                }

                // Ajouter/retirer les classes pour le .dropdown-plus et .dropdown-moins actuels
                if (currentDropdownPlus) {
                    currentDropdownPlus.classList.toggle('hide-opacity');
                }
                if (currentDropdownMoins) {
                    currentDropdownMoins.classList.toggle('show-opacity');
                }

                titleItemDrop.classList.toggle('active-dropdown');
            });
        });
        // // Supprimer les classes lorsque .to-left-mobile-menu est retirée
        // var closeSidebarButton = document.querySelector('.close-sidebar-mobile');

        // closeSidebarButton.addEventListener('click', function () {
        //     var sidebar = document.querySelector('.sidebar-mobile');

        //     // Ajoutez ici le reste de votre code existant pour gérer la fermeture de la sidebar

        //     // Supprimer les classes des dropdowns
        //     removeDropdownClasses();
        // });
        var closeSidebarButton = document.querySelector('.close-sidebar-mobile');
        var backButton = document.querySelectorAll('.back'); // Sélectionnez tous les boutons .back

        function handleBackButtonClick() {
            var sidebar = document.querySelector('.sidebar-mobile');

            // Ajoutez ici le reste de votre code existant pour gérer la fermeture de la sidebar

            // Supprimer les classes des dropdowns
            removeDropdownClasses();
        }

        closeSidebarButton.addEventListener('click', handleBackButtonClick);

        // Ajoutez un gestionnaire d'événement à chaque bouton .back
        backButton.forEach(function (backButton) {
            backButton.addEventListener('click', handleBackButtonClick);
        });




    });

</script><a target="_blank" href="https://wa.me/message/BLOO34ZKHOCIC1" class="fixed-button-whatsapp nav-item-typo">

    <p>Talk with a Donzelli Advisor</p>

    <div id="shuffleButton" class="shuffleButtonFeed small-text">Shuffle</div>
    <div class="button-in-context-image small-text">Switch</div>

</div>
